testcase.name: Verify component dropdown when process type is selected as composites
testcase.system-out: Given user has already logged in to Material Center application.............passed And homepage is displayed...................................................passed When user selects Materials from dropdown...................................passed And user enters searchtext for test data search "ceramics"..................passed And click on search button from homepage....................................passed And materials search results displayed......................................passed And click on rows per page..................................................passed And click on three..........................................................passed And double click on first result............................................passed And click on edit on MatSOD.................................................passed And click on manage process from edit menu on SOD...........................passed And select composites from process type dropdown............................passed And click on process dropdown...............................................passed Then all the components listed are displayed as of selected process type composites.passed
